channel.title: devops on Pierre Marcenac
channel.description: Recent content in devops on Pierre Marcenac

item.title: Bias and Variance in Software Development
item.description: The bias-variance tradeoff is a well-known tradeoff in machine learning. It states you must find the balance between a biased artificial intelligence (AI) and a very unstable AI. You cannot achieve both simultaneously. I will draw in this post a similar parallel in product development in regards to DevOps. Let’s first recap dev’s and ops' respective main objectives. Ops (aka operations) Performance means maintaining a blazing-fast and reliable product.
